title: Automated Testing Mastery
description: Master automated testing to ensure software quality, improve efficiency, and accelerate deployment cycles. This course covers industry-leading tools and frameworks, empowering you to design, execute, and analyze automated tests with confidence.
about: This specialized course is designed to build expertise in automated testing. Whether you're new to testing or an experienced QA engineer, you'll gain the skills to create and maintain robust automated testing suites using popular tools and frameworks.

highlights.name: Test Automation Basics
highlights.description: Understand the fundamentals of test automation and its benefits.

highlights.name: Selenium Mastery
highlights.description: Automate web applications with Selenium WebDriver.

highlights.name: Framework Development
highlights.description: Build reusable and scalable test automation frameworks.

highlights.name: API Testing
highlights.description: Leverage tools like Postman and RestAssured for API testing.

highlights.name: Continuous Integration
highlights.description: Integrate automated testing into CI/CD pipelines.

faq.question: What is the duration of the Automated Testing course?
faq.answer: The course spans three months with flexible scheduling.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate upon completion of the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate will be provided upon successful completion.

faq.question: What kind of support will I receive during the course?
faq.answer: You will receive mentorship, live sessions, and community support.

faq.question: Do I need prior experience in testing?
faq.answer: No prior experience is required. The course is designed for all skill levels.

faq.question: Will the course cover both UI and API testing?
faq.answer: Yes, the course covers comprehensive testing methodologies including UI and API testing.
